mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REFER, STEP, "DEPTH", READCOUNT, DELFLAG, REGDATE FROM ANSWERBOARD ORDER BY REFER DESC, STEP
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANSWERBOARD(SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REFER, STEP, DEPTH, REGDATE, DELFLAG, READCOUNT) VALUES(ANSWERBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, (SELECT REFER FROM ANSWERBOARD a WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), (SELECT STEP FROM ANSWERBOARD a2 WHERE SEQ=#{seq})+1, (SELECT DEPTH FROM ANSWERBOARD a3 WHERE SEQ=#{seq})+1, SYSDATE, 'N',0)
mapper.update: UPDATE ANSWERBOARD SET STEP = STEP +1 WHERE REFER =(SELECT REFER FROM ANSWERBOARD a WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) AND STEP>(SELECT STEP FROM ANSWERBOARD a2 WHERE SEQ=#{seq})
